nodes.text: The Onderon highlands were a mountain range to the east of Onderon's capital city of Iziz.

Around 20 BBY, a droid occupation was present on Onderon under the rule of King Sanjay Rash. During the crisis, the Onderon rebels thought of bringing the droid forces within these highlands to fight rather than in the city of Iziz to keep the people safe and preventing them to get caught in the crossfire. The highlands was also home to the nest.
